Name: GazeMMU
Author: Felix Gaisbauer
LongDescription: A gaze MMU realized using joint angle manipulations.
ShortDescription: A gaze MMU directly manipulating the head joint.

Parameters.Name: TargetID
Parameters.Description: The id of the gaze target

Parameters.Name: LowerLimit
Parameters.Description: The lower angular limit of bending the neck (degree)

Parameters.Name: UpperLimit
Parameters.Description: The upper angular limit of bending the neck (degree)
